body:
Comment 2: 
Andrew, I can't reproduce your problem. From what I can see, subrepos are built with no
problem. You need to make sure your builder is update, including latest fix I sent for
review recently: http://golang.org/cl/5649074/.

Perhaps it is a way you execute it, but there is nothing to it. I run it from Windows
command prompt. Just make sure you have gcc binaries in the PATH. Nothing else needed.

Alex
_Status changed to **WaitingForReply**._
